column4: why is it that everyone has suddenly started shifting to beryl just as Vista has released ? are we in a competition here ?
I just wanted to see what the hoopla was with beryl...I have yet to even see Vista in action
no i'm not asking you I'm asking in general I saw beryl related question yesterday as well, its like all the OS community now realizing after vista that they want 3d interfaces
competition is natural...everyone wants the coolest toys!
